component.name: xnec2c
component.summary: A multi-threaded EM tool based on NEC2 to model antenna radiation patterns

description.p: Xnec2c is a high-performance multi-threaded electromagnetic simulation package to model antenna near- and far-field radiation patterns for Linux and UNIX operating systems. The original FORTRAN version of NEC2 was ported to C by Neoklis Kyriazis, 5B4AZ and released as nec2c. Later he wrote xnec2c, a graphical interface for ease of use with many more features.
